humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: According to the pathology report, the patient had 3 lymph nodes examined, all of which were negative for metastatic carcinoma (Lymph nodes positive: 0, Lymph nodes examined: 3). This information aligns with New Rule 11 and Modified Rule 6, which state that N0 can indicate no metastatic carcinoma in sentinel lymph nodes and regional lymph nodes or that all assessed lymph nodes are negative for metastatic carcinoma. Therefore, the N stage for this patient is N0.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report states that 'LYMPH NODES POSITIVE: 0. LYMPH NODES EXAMINED: 3.' This indicates that no malignant cells were found in any of the examined lymph nodes. Therefore, the pathologic N stage is N0.
